Package eventorg

Class EventCalendar

java.lang.Object
eventorg.EventCalendar
public class EventCalendar extends Object
Holds a list of Event objects to form an event calendar. Contains an events array as well as a number of events tracker. Size of the events array can increase if needed but not decrease.
Author:
Dany Chucri, Madhur Nutulapati

    • getEvents

      public Event[] getEvents()
      Basic getter for the events array.
      Returns:
      An Event[] object representing the list of events.

      public int getNumEvents()
      Basic getter for the EventCalendar's number of events.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the number of events.

    • find

      private int find(Event event)
      Searches for a specified Event object in the list. Uses the criterion specified in Event's equals() method.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event to be searched for.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the position of the Event in the EventCalendar.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Increases the capacity of the events array by adding 4 event slots.

    • add

      public boolean add(Event event)
      Adds a given Event Object to the events array of EventCalendar.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the Event was added, otherwise false.

    • remove

      public boolean remove(Event event)
      Deletes a specified Event Object from the events list.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the Event was removed, otherwise false.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Event event)
      Checks if the specified Event is already in the EventCalendar.
      Parameters:
      event - Event to be looked for.
      Returns:
      True if the Event is in the EventCalendar, otherwise false.

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints out the Events of the calendar as already listed.

    • selectionSortDate

      public void selectionSortDate()
      Used to Sort the EventCalendar by the earlier Date. Utilizes a selection sort algorithm.

    • selectionSortCampus

      public void selectionSortCampus()
      Used to sort the EventCalendar in alphabetical order of the Location of Events. Utilizes a selection sort algorithm.

    • selectionSortDepartment

      public void selectionSortDepartment()
      Used to sort the EventCalendar in alphabetical order of the Department of Events. Utilizes a selection sort algorithm.

      Prints out the events of the calendar, sorted by their dates and timeslots.

      Prints out the events of the calendar, sorted by their campus and building.
